landing.intro: We are a whisky society based in Ostrobothnia, Finland, bringing together enthusiasts from across the region. Through tastings, distillery visits, and other events, we explore the rich world of whisky culture together — from classic Scottish single malts to exciting newcomers from every corner of the globe.

activitiesList.tastings: Regular tastings featuring carefully curated whiskies
activitiesList.trips: Trips to distilleries in Scotland and other whisky-producing countries
activitiesList.events: Themed evenings and social gatherings for members
activitiesList.knowledge: Knowledge sharing and talks on whisky history and production
